::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::

Ramulus jumps back as Spears stabs at him, her quills leaving a rather deep 
slash in his chest. He growls, firing again from his anti-chip weapon at her. 
HIs other hand slides down to his cloaking device, activating it.

Ramulus dissapears from view, firing off another anti-chip beam at Spears.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm growls as weaponfire whizzes by his head, spinning around to see 
where it was coming from.

He dives, flying back up and firing at the source with a few charges.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(Proto wasn't firing)

Proto grunts as a shot hits him in the chest, sending him spiraling a bit 
before regaining stability. He spins around, firing back at Bullet, not sure 
where to aim.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen runs toward Prebon, the forest sizzling around him. He was 
holding his rifle in one end, firing at Prebon, and the anti-chip weapon in 
the other, firing on Spears.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer growls as he looks up at the weaponfire above him. It was not his 
concern, his concern was Ramulus..

The bot's jetpack activates, sending him flying toward Ramulus' location, 
firing a shot toward the forest as he flew.
